item.description:
This first meeting is a test. I would like to see, first, if anyone would like to attend. If we do manage to get a group, it should be wonderful! Bring the book, if you like, and an idea for the next book. We can then make a democratic decision on what the next book should be.

The first book I am openly suggesting is The Time Traveler's Wife by Audrey Niffenegger only because this is the novel I am currently reading.

Let me know if you are interested! I am hoping we can make this a permanent addition to your calendar!
item.how_to_find_us: Details to follow. I have not been to many places around town...so if someone knows of a better place, please make a suggestion.
item.why: Enjoy a relaxing evening out and away from the kids, meet people, talk about favorite books, meet people who love books in your genre, get a chance to voice your opinion on the next book to be chosen, make new friends!
item.name: June Book Club Meeting - The Time Traveler's Wife
